name: Cow Ambush
description:
Put on a cow costume and protect your internet from theft! Dodge UFO attacks, load your blaster and shoot down alien invaders!

CONTROLS

First Player - Arrows Left, Up, Right
Second Player - Buttons A, W, D
M - Music On / Off
To activate sounds, click anywhere in the play area.

CREDITS

Luxorix Games special for Opera GX Game Jam
